data.title: Manisha Koirala ends marriage after 2 years
data.meta_description: Actress Manisha Koirala has been going through a tumultous married life ever since she tied the knot with Samrat Dalal in 2010.The couple finally took a decision to go their separate ways few weeks back.Manisha settled herself in Nepal after marriage, but
data.text:
Actress Manisha Koirala has been going through a tumultous married life ever since she tied the knot with Samrat Dalal in 2010.

The couple finally took a decision to go their separate ways few weeks back.

Manisha settled herself in Nepal after marriage, but realised the marriage was not working out.

According to a leading daily in India, Manisha confided to a close friend about her unhappy married life.

She wanted to work on her marriage and hence, returned to Nepal to be with her husband.

Even though they tried to work things out the differences betweeen them grew till Manisha returned to India.

This also sparked speculation that the actress was looking for an opportunity to return to Bollywood.

Earlier this year, Manisha travelled to Chennai and joined a course to work her on her relationship, but things fell apart and she posted an update on a social networking site about her unhappy state of mind.

Reports of her turbulent relationship made its way to the media. And now, TOI has learnt that the two-year-long marriage is finally over. "Manisha is in Mumbai and happy," revealed a friend of the actress.
